original_title: Gazette on closure of liquidation of two departments
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); An extraordinary gazette was issued informing the closure of liquidation of the Department of Telecommunication and Internal Trade Department.
The gazette was issued by the Ministry of Finance, Economic Stabilization, and National Policies.
